summary: Frontend-only testing completed for Nego talent marketplace. Verified: Landing page loads correctly, registration flow works (role selection for Client/Talent), login page accessible, all legal pages (Terms, Privacy, Cookies) load with proper content, navigation links work, footer links functional. Code review confirmed: formatPrice functions use 'coins' format in all service/booking components, Talent Dashboard queries correct tables (talent_menus, service_types), role-based navigation logic correct (isTalent check), all pages have unique metadata. Registration to dashboard redirect not working (Supabase auth issue - needs investigation).

integration_issues.issue: Registration form submits but does not redirect to dashboard. User stays on /register page after clicking 'Create Account'. No visible error message displayed. Likely Supabase auth configuration issue.

action_items: Investigate Supabase registration flow - registration not redirecting to dashboard
Check Supabase auth configuration and email confirmation settings
Test with existing seeded users if available to verify dashboard navigation
critical_code_review_comments: ✓ formatPrice functions in TalentProfileClient, BrowseClient, DashboardClient, BookingDetailClient, TalentDashboardClient, FavoritesClient all return 'X coins' format
✓ WalletClient correctly uses NGN for coin package prices (real money) and 'coins' for balance display
✓ Talent Dashboard page queries correct tables: talent_menus, service_types (not talent_services, services)
✓ TalentDashboardClient uses correct field names: is_active (not is_available), service_type (not service)
✓ Role-based navigation in DashboardClient: isTalent = profile?.role === 'talent', navItems = isTalent ? talentNavItems : clientNavItems
✓ All pages have unique metadata exports
Note: /app/frontend/src/lib/utils.ts still has formatPrice with NGN format but it's not used by service/booking components

test_credentials.note: Unable to create test users due to registration redirect issue

context_for_next_testing_agent: Registration flow needs investigation - form submits but doesn't redirect. All other UI elements verified working. Code review confirms all formatPrice changes are correct. To test authenticated flows (dashboard, browse, talent profile, booking), need working registration or existing test credentials.

verified_working.landing_page: Loads correctly with header navigation (Home, About us, Collection, Private Content, Login, Register, Buy Tokens)
verified_working.hero_section: Full text 'HAVE YOU NEGOTIATED?' displays correctly
verified_working.registration_step2: Form fields (Name, Email, Password) present, shows 'Signing up as a Talent/Client' based on selection
verified_working.login_page: Loads correctly with email/password fields and Sign In button
verified_working.terms_page: /terms loads with title 'Terms & Conditions - Nego' and full content
verified_working.privacy_page: /privacy loads with title 'Privacy Policy - Nego' and full content
verified_working.cookies_page: /cookies loads with title 'Cookie Policy - Nego' and full content
verified_working.footer_links: All footer links present (Terms & Conditions, Privacy Policy, Cookie Policy, Navigation links)
verified_working.header_auth_buttons: Login, Register, Buy Tokens buttons visible for unauthenticated users

code_review_verified.role_based_nav: isTalent check at line 55, navItems selection at line 56 in DashboardClient.tsx
